Analyzer - Class in ch.linetic.analysis
Abstract implementation of the AnalyzerInterface As all the analyzers has a lot in common, the abstract class is a helper class that all concrete analyzer should extends from.
AnalyzerComponent - Class in ch.linetic.gui.component
Component of the GUI that display the result of an Analyzer

AnalyzerInterface - Interface in ch.linetic.analysis
